Name: Fire Bomb
Description: Take aim and launch this volatile cocktail that explodes on impact. The flaming debris spreads up to 3.2 meters away, burning any monster in its radius.

Misc.ToolTip: The base crafting time of the Fire Bomb
The base amount of bottles given to you when crafting the Fire Bomb.
The default maximum amount of throw distance on the Fire Bomb.
The amount of continuous damage required by the Fire Bomb in order to wound or stun the monster.
The radius of the fire pool when the Fire Bomb has detonated.
The default lifetime of the flame pool when the Fire Bomb has been detonated.
The default amount of lifetime of a Fire Bomb in the thrown state This value may be incorrect!.
The default amount of time it takes for the flame debris from the Fire Bomb to dissipate.
The amount of visual spreads on the Fire Bomb debris. This value is purely visual.
The offset between the different spreads of the flame debris. This value is purely visual.
The vertical spread between the flame debris (assumed to be the flames that fall when you hit a ceiling with the Fire Bomb). This value may be incorrect!
The number of different zones in the flame debris that could damage the monster. This value may be incorrect!
The minimum speed of the flame debris projectiles upon the detonation of the Fire Bomb.
The maximum speed of the flame debris projectiles upon the detonation of the Fire Bomb.
The default amount of time it takes for the Fire Bomb to warm up initially when trying to throw it.

WeaponMods.Name: Bottled Up
WeaponMods.Description:
+ You can now create 1 additional Fire Bomb when crafted.
- The crafting time of the Fire Bomb is increased by 40%.

Misc.ToolTip: The extra number of bottles received from running Bottled Up.

Stats.Name: Bottled Up Craft Speed Penalty Multiplier

Misc.ToolTip: The craft speed penalty multiplier applied to crafting Fire Bombs when running Bottled Up.

WeaponMods.Name: To The Brim
WeaponMods.Description:
+ The Fire Bomb flames burn for 25% longer.
- The distance the Fire Bomb can be thrown is reduced by 25%.

Misc.ToolTip: The multiplier applied to the Fire Bomb debris lifetime when running To The Brim.
The penalty multiplier applied to the range of the Fire Bomb's throw.

WeaponMods.Name: Hot Foot
WeaponMods.Description:
+ Teens that enter the flames of your Fire Bomb will gain a 25% speed boost for the next 2 seconds.
- The Fire Bomb flames burn out 25% sooner.

Misc.ToolTip: The movement speed multiplier applied to teen movement speed when meeting the conditions of Hot Foot.
The penalty multiplier applied to the lifetime of the Fire Bomb debris.

WeaponMods.Name: Lasting Burns
WeaponMods.Description:
+ If the monster escapes from damage dealt by your Fire Bomb they will be slowed by 30% for 3 seconds.
- The Fire Bomb takes an additional 0.15 seconds to be ready to throw.

Misc.ToolTip: The penalty multiplier applied to the monster's movement speed when escaping damage from a Fire Bomb running Lasting Burns.
The duration of the penalty applied to the monster's movement speed when escaping damage from a Fire Bomb running Lasting Burns.
The extra duration added to the warmup time of the Fire Bomb.

WeaponMods.Name: All in The Wrist
WeaponMods.Description: * The Fire Bomb now bounces a single time when hitting a surface before exploding.

Misc.ToolTip: The bounciness constant applied to a Fire Bomb running All in The Wrist. The higher the value, the more bouncy it is (0 to 1 range).
The number of bounces the Fire Bomb will do before detonating.
